profile.name: Haz
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer | Building scalable web applications with Ariakit and React
profile.summary: Highly motivated software engineer with a passion for building scalable web applications. With expertise in JavaScript, TypeScript, and various frameworks like Ariakit and React, I'm always looking to improve my skills and contribute to open-source projects.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer @ariakit
description: Designed and implemented REST API generator using Ariakit and MongoDB.
Developed Raycast extensions for improved user experience.

experience.title: Freelance Developer (2023-2024)
description: Contributed to open-source projects like Ariakit and React headless components.
Built REST API generator using JavaScript and MongoDB.

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer (2022-2023)
description: Maintained Ariakit repository and ensured bug fixes and feature updates.
Contributed to React headless components project.
